metadata.title: Ginger Ray Pastel Perfection Metallic Party Paper Straws, Gold (PP-651)
features: Pack of 25 gold metallic paper straws
Part of Ginger Ray's Pastel Perfection Range
The product is manufactured in China
description: This pack contains 25 paper party straws each metallic gold. These fun, trendy and stylish straws are perfect to serve at almost any party. Great for a kids birthday party, summer party, BBQ, wedding reception, baby shower or any event! Use them with our pastel pink and gold foiled paper plates and paper napkins for a great look and total convenience. The product is manufactured in China.
